thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Sara Palmer from Hampshire England
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Sara Palmer from Hampshire England

author: Sara Palmer from Hampshire England
title: Sara Palmer from Hampshire England
text:
I was a little sceptical ordering a wedding outfit from a store in Ireland, as I live in England and only knew that Irish designers are the best of the best
The staff at Mcelhinneys were exceptionally helpful and talked me through the descriptions of my prospective purchases before I ordered.I chose 2 outfits intending to return the one least suitable. Both outfits arrived after 3 days, beautifully packaged and with a personal touch.The quality of my pieces is breathtaking compared to clothing here. I have decided to keep both outfits and stun the congregation!!! A big thank you to all concerned.
Would thoroughly recommend the service and quality from Mcelhinneys
